p: The lists of attributes we identified will have broader impacts beyond trainee selection. In addition to selecting trainees who are already strong in these priority attributes, the program will emphasize these attributes in the curriculum, thus moving toward brand implementation ( 5). As such, going forward there will be a need for both curricular renewal and faculty development in relation to the identified attributes. Moreover, the attributes reflect the co-constructed priorities of the current faculty and learners in the Division. The attributes have since been incorporated into the Division's mission & vision statement that are articulated on the Divisional website, thus highlighting both internally and externally their value to the leadership and contributing to brand image ( 5).
